channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Micron shares plunge on weak second-quarter guidance
item.description: Micron shares plunged in extended trading after the chipmaker issued weaker-than-expected second-quarter guidance.

item.title: Banks Sue Federal Reserve Over 'Lack of Transparency' in Stress Testing
item.description: The Fed on Monday said it planned to overhaul the stress-test regime for banks and planned to seek public comment on planned changes.

item.title: Nike CEO Elliott Hill outlines new strategy after retailer blames promotions for declining revenue and profit
item.description: Nike beat Wall Street's expectations on the top and bottom lines under new CEO Elliott Hill.

item.title: Stocks Steady to Start Short Christmas Eve Trading Session
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, in a holiday-shortened pre-Christmas trading session with all three major indexes gaining for the third trading day in a row.

item.title: Costco quarter signals record stock run is not done yet. Here's our new price target
item.description: With gross margins and paid memberships trending higher, this rally to fresh highs can continue.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Gain in Quiet Trade
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures are higher in light trade, with participants focused on weather forecasts suggesting strong heating demand for January.

item.title: Gold Futures Slip Slightly in Slow Holiday Trading
item.description: Gold futures slipped slightly amid low holiday trading volumes, reversing earlier gains.

item.title: AI chipmaker Broadcom shares soar 17% despite mixed quarterly results â€” here's why
item.description: We're increasing our price target on the stock after a slew of positive AI updates.

item.title: Darden Restaurants stock climbs as Olive Garden, LongHorn Steakhouse fuel sales growth
item.description: Darden Restaurants met Wall Street's expectations for its fiscal second-quarter results.

item.title: Sterling Loses Some of Its Shine
item.description: Sterling was up slightly against the dollar in early trade, but is no longer the best-performing G-10 currency in 2024, driven into second place by th...
